definition: head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Be gentle when washing your face and hair or using cosmetics.
sentences.chinese: 洗脸，梳头和用化妆品时，行动要柔柔等。

sentences.english: My hands can comb my hair and fold in prayer.
sentences.chinese: 我可以用手梳头，可以合掌祈祷。

sentences.english: Combing the hair is easy to understand too, because it would be a mess if you didn’t comb it.
sentences.chinese: 梳头发了很好理解，因为如果不去弄就会变成一团糟。

sentences.english: I combed my hair with my hair brush and made it into a pony.
sentences.chinese: 我用我的梳子梳头并把头发弄成小马辫。

sentences.english: Herald new-onset, cold winter months, up Yong since comb my hair.
sentences.chinese: 蕊初发，寒冷的冬季，起来慵自梳头。

sentences.english: I shower, clean up, do my hair.
Did she just brush her hair with that?
sentences.chinese: 她刚用它来梳头发了不成？

sentences.english: I had to comb their hair.
Doctors gave a warning that she could die by simply brushing her hair.
sentences.chinese: 她被医师警告称，梳头发也可能害她“死掉”。

sentences.english: The girl fixes her hair with her favourite brush.
sentences.chinese: 女孩用自己心爱的发刷梳头。

sentences.english: Comb your hair before you go out.
eg: My mom helped me combing my hair when I was young.
sentences.chinese: 我小时候都是妈妈帮我梳头发。

sentences.english: Hurstwood encountered Jessica in her dressing-room, very leisurely arranging her hair.
sentences.chinese: 在梳妆间里她看到杰西卡还在慢条斯理地梳头。

sentences.english: You brush your hair with a brush, or comb your hair with a comb.
sentences.chinese: 中文里的“梳头发”对应的英文有两个吗？

sentences.english: I never thought on everything you want and you everyway fixed your hair.
sentences.chinese: 我没有想到你的一切需求，你梳头的每种方式。

definition: to wash one's hair/to have a shampoo
to massage sb's back by pounding it lightly with one's fists
to make a bed/to lay bedding
